title: Remake in a promotion series
body: I was in a promotional series to go from Silver IV to Silver III. Game 1 was a win. Game 2 was a remake, which was apparently counted as a loss. My match history reflects this. The other team had an AFK and the game was remade, but I was given a loss in my series. When we lost game 3, I was denied my promotion. I don't believe this is an intentional element of the remake tool.

replies.body:
This seemed strange, so I looked into this and found that you dodged during your series. During a series, any dodge will count as a loss in your series and will  disqualify you from Promo Helper for the series. For complete info, check out our [queue dodging FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Lol, I had the exact same thing last game. We remade a game due to us having an afk, which wasn't me, but this gave me a loss in my promos. Is this a bug or something?

If you afked before a remake was initiated (took no damage / did not attack / did not consistently move) then you would be marked as "afk" and this would count as a loss.
